projects.title: Mono/Type
projects.subtitle: Editorial Design
projects.description: A typographic exploration into the duality of digital editorial design.

caseStudy.challenge: Create a digital magazine that pushes the boundaries of web typography.
caseStudy.approach: We developed a modular grid system that adapts to different content types.
caseStudy.result: A unique reading experience that garnered industry recognition.

projects.title: Kinetic Energy
projects.subtitle: Brand Identity
projects.description: Dynamic brand identity for a forward-thinking energy startup.

caseStudy.challenge: Position a new player in the renewable energy sector.
caseStudy.approach: Created a visual system based on energy flow and transformation.
caseStudy.result: A distinctive brand that stands out in a crowded market.

projects.title: Void Systems
projects.subtitle: Website Design
projects.description: Minimalist web experience for a cybersecurity firm.

caseStudy.challenge: Convey security and trust through minimal design.
caseStudy.approach: Dark theme with subtle animations and clear information hierarchy.
caseStudy.result: 40% increase in qualified leads within first quarter.

projects.title: Ritual Coffee
projects.subtitle: Packaging Design
projects.description: Elegant packaging system for artisanal coffee roasters.

caseStudy.challenge: Create premium packaging that reflects craft and quality.
caseStudy.approach: Minimalist design with focus on typography and sustainable materials.
caseStudy.result: 30% sales increase and multiple design awards.

projects.title: Bloom Festival
projects.subtitle: Event Branding
projects.description: Vibrant visual identity for a music and arts festival.

caseStudy.challenge: Stand out in the crowded festival market.
caseStudy.approach: Bold color palette and organic shapes inspired by nature.
caseStudy.result: Sold-out event with strong social media presence.

projects.title: Neural Labs
projects.subtitle: Brand Identity
projects.description: Modern identity for an AI research laboratory.

caseStudy.challenge: Make cutting-edge AI research accessible and human.
caseStudy.approach: Clean, technical aesthetic balanced with warmth.

projects.title: Alto Magazine
projects.subtitle: Editorial Design
projects.description: Contemporary design for a culture and lifestyle publication.

caseStudy.challenge: Refresh a traditional magazine for younger audience.
caseStudy.approach: Bold layouts with focus on visual storytelling.

projects.title: Lunar Studios
projects.subtitle: Website Design
projects.description: Portfolio website for a motion design studio.

caseStudy.challenge: Showcase motion work in an engaging web format.
caseStudy.approach: Video-first design with smooth scroll interactions.
caseStudy.result: Featured on Awwwards and CSS Design Awards.

projects.title: Forge Collective
projects.subtitle: Brand Identity
projects.description: Industrial-inspired identity for a creative coworking space.

caseStudy.challenge: Create community-focused brand for diverse creatives.
caseStudy.approach: Modular system that celebrates individual makers.
caseStudy.result: Full occupancy within 3 months of opening.

projects.title: Echo Sound
projects.subtitle: Product Design
projects.description: Minimalist interface for a music streaming app.

caseStudy.approach: Focus on intuitive navigation and beautiful album art.

projects.title: Summit Ventures
projects.subtitle: Brand Identity
projects.description: Professional identity for a venture capital firm.

caseStudy.challenge: Appear approachable yet professional to startups.
caseStudy.approach: Modern aesthetic with trustworthy color palette.
caseStudy.result: Positioned as a top-tier early stage investor.

projects.title: Pulse Fitness
projects.subtitle: App Design
projects.description: Energetic mobile app for personal training.

caseStudy.challenge: Make fitness tracking motivating and fun.
caseStudy.approach: Gamification elements with clear progress visualization.
